name: Quick Pickled Apple Matchsticks
description: I got my first CSA share of the season a week ago, and in addition to the other spring vegetables like snap peas and breakfast radishes, it came with an enormous head of red butter lettuce, an unwieldy bunch of kale, dandelion greens, and bags of spicy arugula and mixed salad greens. You will not â€¦
recipeIngredient:
1 medium apple
1/2 cup apple cider vinegar
1 tablespoon honey
1/2 teaspoon kosher salt
2-3 turns of a pepper grinder

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the apples into matchsticks and toss them with the vinegar, honey, salt, and pepper. Use immediately or stash them in a jar and put them in the fridge. They'll keep well for 2-3 weeks in the refrigerator.
